title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From principles to practice: Scaling AI responsibly with Indeed (AIM3323)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从原则到实践：与Indeed一起负责任地扩展AI (AIM3323)
abstract: Building trusted AI applications requires balancing innovation speed with risk management across an increasingly complex set of responsible AI dimensions, including privacy, security, robustness, fairness, safety, transparency, and explainability. Join this session to learn about the AWS Responsible AI Best Practices Framework and discover how Indeed built an intelligent risk management platform that embeds responsible AI across the AI lifecycle, enabling rapid product development while protecting millions of job seekers. Walk away with actionable strategies for implementing responsible AI practices in your own applications.
abstract_cn: 构建可信的AI应用需要在日益复杂的负责任AI维度中平衡创新速度与风险管理，这些维度包括隐私、安全、鲁棒性、公平性、安全性、透明度和可解释性。参加本次会议，了解AWS负责任AI最佳实践框架，并探索Indeed如何构建智能风险管理平台，在AI生命周期中嵌入负责任AI，在保护数百万求职者的同时实现快速产品开发。您将获得在自己的应用中实施负责任AI实践的可行策略。

presenter.name: Mike Diamond
presenter.title: Principal Product Manager for Responsible AI

presenter.name: Lewis Baker
presenter.title: Sr Manager, Data Science - Responsible AI
